com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.listener

Interface DynamicResolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicTheme

    public interface DynamicResolver
    An interface to resolve dynamic theme according to the various conditions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Date getNightTimeEnd()
      Returns end time for the night theme.

      Returns start time for the night theme.

      Checks for the night time.

      Checks for the night time according to the supplied value.

      Checks whether the system night mode is enabled.

      Resolves night theme according to the selected implementation.

      Resolves night theme according to the selected implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • isSystemNightMode

        boolean isSystemNightMode()
        Checks whether the system night mode is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if the system night mode is enabled.

      • isNight

        boolean isNight()
        Checks for the night time.

        Useful to apply themes based on the day and night.

        Returns:
        true if it is night.

      • isNight

        boolean isNight(int theme)
        Checks for the night time according to the supplied value.

        Useful to apply themes based on the day and night.

        Parameters:
        theme - The integer value of the theme.
        Returns:
        true if it is night.

      • isNight

        boolean isNight(String theme)
        Checks for the night time according to the supplied value.

        Useful to apply themes based on the day and night.

        Parameters:
        theme - The string value of the theme.
        Returns:
        true if it is night.

      • getNightTimeStart

        Date getNightTimeStart()
        Returns start time for the night theme.
        Returns:
        The start time for the night theme.

      • getNightTimeEnd

        Date getNightTimeEnd()
        Returns end time for the night theme.
        Returns:
        The end time for the night theme.

      • resolveNightTheme

        boolean resolveNightTheme(int appTheme,
                          int implementation)
        Resolves night theme according to the selected implementation.
        Parameters:
        appTheme - The app theme to resolve the auto night theme.
        implementation - The implementation for the night theme.
        Returns:
        true if the night theme is enabled according to the selected implementation.

      • resolveNightTheme

        boolean resolveNightTheme(String appTheme,
                          String implementation)
        Resolves night theme according to the selected implementation.
        Parameters:
        appTheme - The app theme to resolve the auto night theme.
        implementation - The implementation for the night theme.
        Returns:
        true if the night theme is enabled according to the selected implementation.
